why-choose-bespoke.title: Why a Custom Website Outperforms Templates

uniqueness.title: Unique Brand Identity
uniqueness.description: Stand out from the crowd with a website custom-designed to reflect your brand's unique personality and values, unlike generic templates.

scalability.title: Scalable for Growth
scalability.description: Your website grows with your business. Custom solutions are built to be easily expandable, adding new features and functionalities as your needs evolve.

ownership.title: Full Ownership & Control
ownership.description: Gain complete control over your digital asset. A bespoke website means you own the code and have the flexibility to implement any future vision without limitations.

performance.title: Optimized Performance
performance.description: Custom websites are lean and optimized for speed, ensuring a fast and smooth experience for your visitors, which improves SEO and user engagement.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: Tailored security measures are implemented from the ground up, providing a more robust defense against vulnerabilities compared to off-the-shelf platforms.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Receive personalized support and maintenance for your unique website, ensuring it remains up-to-date, secure, and performs optimally.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing for Your Simple Website

basic.title: Basic Presence
basic.description: Ideal for personal portfolios or small informational sites.

standard.title: Small Business Starter
standard.description: Perfect for small businesses needing an online presence with key features.

premium.title: Enhanced Business Package
premium.description: For businesses looking for more advanced features and deeper engagement.

calculator.title: Build Your Custom Website Quote
calculator.description: Select the features you need to get an estimated price for your bespoke website. All prices are one-time fees unless specified otherwise.
calculator.max-price-reached: You've reached the maximum estimated price of €3000. Please contact us for a custom quote.
calculator.note: Prices are estimates and may vary. Max estimated project cost: €{maxPrice}.

nawijzer.caption-2: Filament admin panel with dark mode
nawijzer.description: NaWijzer.nl is a website I build for my first client: Adequaat, Groningen. The website presents a political questionnaire to the users. The website also has a webapp behind the scenes that allows admins to generate reports as well as create new questions and answer sets.

bespoke-solutions.description: Tired of generic builders? I craft visually stunning, fast-loading static websites, perfect for brands seeking a unique and blazing-fast online presence.

bespoke-solutions.title: Simple Websites

freelance.title: Freelance Development
freelance.description: Looking to hire a skilled developer for your team? I bring expertise in modern web technologies and frameworks to help your projects succeed.

features.agile-git: Agile workflow and Git best practices

web-application-development.title: Custom Software Solutions
web-application-development.description: Need a complete business solution? From database design to full-stack applications, I create scalable and secure software tailored to your needs.

tech-stack.laravel: We use laravel for our backend and fullstack projects. Whether you need a simple API or a full blown webapp, laravel is a great choice. We often combine laravel with other tools like InertiaJS which allows us to build a rich javascript supported webapp without needing a separate (sub)domain.
tech-stack.next: We use NextJS for our website projects. NextJS uses strategies like server side rendering, static generation and code splitting to provide a the fastest experience. It uses React under the hood so we have access to all the great libraries out there. When possible we prefer to use NextJS over standalone React, Vue or Laravel + JavaScript Framework solutions due to the massive performance boost NextJS provides. codehouse.sandercokart.com was build with this!
tech-stack.react: React is our go-to framework for building websites and webapps. The reason behind this is that React has the largest community and is the most popular framework. This means we can save a lot of time by using existing solutions and libraries to speed up development.
tech-stack.title: Tech Stack
tech-stack.vue: We use VueJS as an alternative to React. It is often combined with NuxtJS which is much like NextJS but for Vue. Statistically speaking, Vue is faster than React due to how it handles reactivity. It is much younger than React though and has a smaller community. This means that there are less existing solutions and libraries available.

testimonials.adequaat: Sander is an ambitious programmer at the beginning of his career. Sander is technically very good and can quickly switch. We would definitely hire Sander again.
